# dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
general:
  description: général
  varname:
    type: string
    description: No change
    multi: true
    default:
      - a
version: '1.0'
```
# dictionaries/extra/00-base.yml

```yaml
---
version: '1.1'
var:  # a varaible
  - a
dyn_{{ identifier }}:
  dynamic:
    variable: _.var
  var:
```
